long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you make more efficient use of your Google sheets by accommodating tabs with a sidebar on the left.

This brings a lot of benefits:
✅ No more horizontal scrolling
✅ Find your tabs super easy
✅ Coding-like experience using Google sheets

This is just the beginning of many new features that are coming in the next weeks.

Enjoy!
